body.p: 设置变量FEATURES能实时的干预到Portage的工作和软件包的编译. 但是对于已经被安装在系统中的软件包是没有效果的.

tr.ti: Raise an error if an installing package attempts to overwrite a file which is provided by a different package.
When utilizing ebuild, only run the function requested.
Do some extra checks for potentially dangerous situations (eg missing Manifest files).
Drop to non-root privileges for certain phases.
Enables the sandbox even when running non-privileged.
